mapper.insert: insert into meta_data ( url, publish_time, created_time, block_no, yongdi_mianji, jianzhu_mianji, start_price, finish_price, main_content, tudi_shiyong_xingzhi )values ( #{url}, #{publishTime}, #{createdTime}, #{blockNo}, #{yongdiMianji}, #{jianzhuMianji}, #{startPrice}, #{finishPrice}, #{mainContent}, #{tudiShiyongXingzhi} )
